p: Phylogenetic trees were constructed using the maximum likelihood method in the MEGA program (Version 5.05). One thousand bootstrap replications were used to estimate distances. Bootstrap values greater than 70% are shown for selected nodes in Fig.Â 2 (a-d). Whole-genome sequences and hexon, fiber, and penton gene sequences from other HAdVs were downloaded from GenBank on April 3, 2019.
